verses.esv:
14   Where there is no guidance, a people falls,
    but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.
verses.kjv: 14 Where no counsel is, the people fall: but in the multitude of counsellors there is safety.
verses.niv: 14 For lack of guidance a nation falls, but many advisers make victory sure.

verses.esv: 7 for God gave us a spirit not of fear but of power and love and self-control.
verses.kjv: 7 For God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind.
verses.niv: 7 For God did not give us a spirit of timidity, but a spirit of power, of love and of self-discipline.

verses.esv:
17   For I will restore health to you,
    and your wounds I will heal,
      declares the LORD,
  because they have called you an outcast:
    ‘It is Zion, for whom no one cares!’
verses.kjv: 17 For I will restore health unto thee, and I will heal thee of thy wounds, saith the LORD; because they called thee an Outcast, saying, This is Zion, whom no man seeketh after.
verses.niv: 17 But I will restore you to health and heal your wounds,' declares the LORD, 'because you are called an outcast, Zion for whom no one cares.'

verses.esv: 1:1 The revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave him to show to his servants the things that must soon take place. He made it known by sending his angel to his servant John,
verses.kjv: 1 The Revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave unto him, to shew unto his servants things which must shortly come to pass; and he sent and signified it by his angel unto his servant John:
verses.niv: 1 The revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave him to show his servants what must soon take place. He made it known by sending his angel to his servant John,

verses.esv: 6:1 Brothers, if anyone is caught in any transgression, you who are spiritual should restore him in a spirit of gentleness. Keep watch on yourself, lest you too be tempted.
verses.kjv: 1 Brethren, if a man be overtaken in a fault, ye which are spiritual, restore such an one in the spirit of meekness; considering thyself, lest thou also be tempted.
verses.niv: 1 Brothers, if someone is caught in a sin, you who are spiritual should restore him gently. But watch yourself, or you also may be tempted.

verses.esv: 2 Do not be conformed to this world, but be transformed by the renewal of your mind, that by testing you may discern what is the will of God, what is good and acceptable and perfect.
verses.kjv: 2 And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind, that ye may prove what is that good, and acceptable, and perfect, will of God.
verses.niv: 2 Do not conform any longer to the pattern of this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind. Then you will be able to test and approve what God's will is--his good, pleasing and perfect will.

verses.esv:
6   For to us a child is born,
    to us a son is given;
  and the government shall be upon his shoulder,
    and his name shall be called
  Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God,
    Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace.
verses.kjv: 6 For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.
verses.niv: 6 For to us a child is born, to us a son is given, and the government will be on his shoulders. And he will be called Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God, Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace.

verses.esv:
22   A joyful heart is good medicine,
    but a crushed spirit dries up the bones.
verses.kjv: 22 A merry heart doeth good like a medicine: but a broken spirit drieth the bones.
verses.niv: 22 A cheerful heart is good medicine, but a crushed spirit dries up the bones.

verses.esv: 24 He himself bore our sins in his body on the tree, that we might die to sin and live to righteousness. By his wounds you have been healed.
verses.kjv: 24 Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree, that we, being dead to sins, should live unto righteousness: by whose stripes ye were healed.
verses.niv: 24 He himself bore our sins in his body on the tree, so that we might die to sins and live for righteousness; by his wounds you have been healed.

verses.esv:
14   Heal me, O LORD, and I shall be healed;
    save me, and I shall be saved,
    for you are my praise.
verses.kjv: 14 Heal me, O LORD, and I shall be healed; save me, and I shall be saved: for thou art my praise.
verses.niv: 14 Heal me, O LORD, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

verses.esv:
3   The LORD sustains him on his sickbed;
    in his illness you restore him to full health.
verses.kjv: 3 The LORD will strengthen him upon the bed of languishing: thou wilt make all his bed in his sickness.
verses.niv: 3 The LORD will sustain him on his sickbed and restore him from his bed of illness.

verses.esv: 7 Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
verses.kjv: 7 Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
verses.niv: 7 Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

verses.esv: 13 I can do all things through him who strengthens me.
verses.kjv: 13 I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
verses.niv: 13 I can do everything through him who gives me strength.

verses.esv: 6 do not be anxious about anything, but in everything by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known to God. 7 And the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
verses.kjv: 6 Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God. 7 And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
verses.niv: 6 Do not be anxious about anything, but in everything, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God. 7 And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.

verses.esv: 28 Come to me, all who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest. 29 Take my yoke upon you, and learn from me, for I am gentle and lowly in heart, and you will find rest for your souls.
verses.kjv: 28 Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest. 29 Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls.
verses.niv: 28 "Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest. 29 Take my yoke upon you and learn from me, for I am gentle and humble in heart, and you will find rest for your souls.

verses.esv: 23 And Jesus said to him, “‘If you can’! All things are possible for one who believes.”
verses.kjv: 23 Jesus said unto him, If thou canst believe, all things are possible to him that believeth.
verses.niv: 23 "'If you can'?" said Jesus. "Everything is possible for him who believes."

verses.esv: 15 And the prayer of faith will save the one who is sick, and the Lord will raise him up. And if he has committed sins, he will be forgiven.
verses.kjv: 15 And the prayer of faith shall save the sick, and the Lord shall raise him up; and if he have committed sins, they shall be forgiven him.
verses.niv: 15 And the prayer offered in faith will make the sick person well; the Lord will raise him up. If he has sinned, he will be forgiven.

verses.esv: 16 All Scripture is breathed out by God and profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for training in righteousness, 17 that the man of God may be complete, equipped for every good work.
verses.kjv: 16 All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness: 17 That the man of God may be perfect, throughly furnished unto all good works.
verses.niv: 16 All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness, 17 so that the man of God may be thoroughly equipped for every good work.

verses.esv: 12 For the word of God is living and active, sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing to the division of soul and of spirit, of joints and of marrow, and discerning the thoughts and intentions of the heart.
verses.kjv: 12 For the word of God is quick, and powerful, and sharper than any twoedged sword, piercing even to the dividing asunder of soul and spirit, and of the joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.
verses.niv: 12 For the word of God is living and active. Sharper than any double--edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow; it judges the thoughts and attitudes of the heart.

verses.esv: 11:1 Now faith is the assurance of things hoped for, the conviction of things not seen.
verses.kjv: 1 Now faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen.
verses.niv: 1 Now faith is being sure of what we hope for and certain of what we do not see.

verses.esv: 5:1 For freedom Christ has set us free; stand firm therefore, and do not submit again to a yoke of slavery.
verses.kjv: 1 Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage.
verses.niv: 1 It is for freedom that Christ has set us free. Stand firm, then, and do not let yourselves be burdened again by a yoke of slavery.

verses.esv: 23 (No longer drink only water, but use a little wine for the sake of your stomach and your frequent ailments.)
verses.kjv: 23 Drink no longer water, but use a little wine for thy stomach’s sake and thine often infirmities.
verses.niv: 23 Stop drinking only water, and use a little wine because of your stomach and your frequent illnesses.

verses.esv: 23 Whatever you do, work heartily, as for the Lord and not for men,
verses.kjv: 23 And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men;
verses.niv: 23 Whatever you do, work at it with all your heart, as working for the Lord, not for men,

verses.esv:
10   fear not, for I am with you;
    be not dismayed, for I am your God;
  I will strengthen you, I will help you,
    I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
verses.kjv: 10 Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.
verses.niv: 10 So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.

verses.esv: 9:1 And he called the twelve together and gave them power and authority over all demons and to cure diseases, 2 and he sent them out to proclaim the kingdom of God and to heal.
verses.kjv: 1 Then he called his twelve disciples together, and gave them power and authority over all devils, and to cure diseases. 2 And he sent them to preach the kingdom of God, and to heal the sick.
verses.niv: 1 When Jesus had called the Twelve together, he gave them power and authority to drive out all demons and to cure diseases, 2 and he sent them out to preach the kingdom of God and to heal the sick.
